com.jme3.scene.plugins.blender.animations

Class BoneEnvelope

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jme3.scene.plugins.blender.animations.BoneEnvelope

  • public class BoneEnvelope
extends java.lang.Object
    An implementation of bone envelope. Used when assigning bones to the mesh by envelopes.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BoneEnvelope(Structure boneStructure, Matrix4f armatureWorldMatrix, boolean fixUpAxis)
      The constructor of bone envelope.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • BoneEnvelope

        public BoneEnvelope(Structure boneStructure,
            Matrix4f armatureWorldMatrix,
            boolean fixUpAxis)
        The constructor of bone envelope. It reads all the needed data. Take notice that the positions of head and tail are computed in the world space and that the points' positions given for computations should be in world space as well.
        Parameters:
        boneStructure - the blender bone structure
        armatureWorldMatrix - the world matrix of the armature object
        fixUpAxis - a variable that tells if we use the Y-is up axis orientation

    • Method Detail

      • isInEnvelope

        public boolean isInEnvelope(Vector3f point)
        The method verifies if the given point is inside the envelope.
        Parameters:
        point - the point in 3D space (MUST be in a world coordinate space)
        Returns:
        true if the point is inside the envelope and false otherwise

      • getWeight

        public float getWeight()
        Returns:
        the weight of the bone

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
